name: Lily
tagline: Lily is a simple lightweight Web Framework developed and maintained by Mohammed Yehia
body:
# Lily
Lily is a simple lightweigth framework for php web development. Currently Lily is under heavy development. If you want to contribute please contact me at firefoxegy@gmail.com

## About Lily Development
Currently Lily is under heavy development.
